message: Hi Bob, I propose a split where I receive $55 and you get $45. I believe this is a fair starting point and I’m excited to hear your thoughts. Let’s settle this quickly and amicably!

Hi Alice, thanks for the initial offer. I was thinking a more even split would be better, but since I'm taking the risk of going second, I'll take a bit more. Let's settle on 60-40, it's still a good deal for both of us.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer in round 2. To move things forward, I propose a division where I receive $52 and you get $48. I believe this split fairly compensates both for the risk and opportunity cost. Let's settle on this and finish the game on a positive note!
